headline: Ask HN: BitWarden Master Password No Longer Works
description:
So my BitWarden master password stopped working. I am 100% confident that my password has not changed, but the developers changed the way passwords are handled.

In the past, my password would work on Chrome, but would fail to work on Mobile. I opened an issue and it was ignored.

Now my master password does not work anywhere (APART FROM THS LAPTOP and I was lucky to export my passwords.)

So heres a warning to all. Do not use BitWarden, they handle passwords incorrectly and you may lose all your passwords if they decide to randomly change password handling.

Possible Problem: They truncate passwords before sending to server? IDK at what length they truncate.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: BitWarden主密码不再起作用
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: BitWarden主密碼不再起作用
description_zh-Hans:
所以我的BitWarden主密码停止工作。我100%相信我的密码没有改变，但开发者改变了处理密码的方式。

过去，我的密码在Chrome浏览器上可以使用，但在手机上却无法使用。

现在我的主密码在任何地方都无法使用（除了THS的笔记本电脑，我很幸运地导出了我的密码）。不要使用BitWarden，他们对密码的处理是不正确的，如果他们决定随机改变密码的处理，你可能会失去你所有的密码。不知道他们截断的长度是多少。
